CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 20, 1965, pg. 8 reads: "Seagram's Choice Christmas Gift - Seagram, the splendid distiller of excellent spirits, has added a new package to its long and honorable list. 100 Pipers Scotch joins Seagram's 7 Crown, VO, Gin and Crown.  Royal on the list for your Christmas giving.  Shown here with their products are Bob French (left), sales representative, and Frank Cepits (right, West Pennsylvania State manager of Seagram's District Company.  You are invited to try all of these superlative products for the holidays.  Seagram's 7 Crown remains the largest selling whiskey in the country, and VO is still No. 2.  The rest of Seagram's offerings are rapidly moving up. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Sales representative Robert "Bob" P. French Jr., and regional sales manager Frank Cepits, posed with display of Seagram products, in interior with bold block print patterned curtain
